attributes.additional_details:
Those who have sought asylum in UK should be allowed the right to rest for 6 months, medical care, and to partake in military training, then return to the homeland to fight for its liberation and freedom.

Those who came for asylum, who's homeland has been liberated must return immediately, with all relatives begat by them in this land.

There must be the availability to work in exchange for weapons.

Finally a policy that helps the opressed to help themselves and their countrymen!
